name: Knife Throwing Master 3D
description:
Do you like archery simulators? Ever dreamt ‘bout fame of such famous men as Robin Hood? Well, this time we've made something unusual for you! Try yourself as a knife thrower with Knife Throwing Master 3D – great app for all archery simulation lovers!

Join this knife throwing tournament and collect all prizes to prove yourself as a real professional! Don’t be scared by challenges of other participants – count them as intense training before the championship! Be careful and accurate, aim the bullseye, make allowances to the wind and hit the target with successful throw! It's not like tossing a paper, feel the extreme taking part in knife throwing tournament!

Have you ever seen a contest of throwing knives mastery? Have you ever imagine how it feels and what sound does knife when cuts into the target? Now you can just throw knives by your own! Aim accurately, precisely calculate an angle of shooting and power of throw – and shoot right in the bullseye! Feel the real sports passion with Knife Throwing Master in 3D!

Earn points to buy new knives or another throwing weapons. Try all of it to choose the best knife for each type of missions – and complete all tasks and missions with the best result! Raise your throwing skills and become the best of the best with Knife Throwing Master 3D!

Knife Throwing Master 3D features:

- Feel as a real master thrower!
- Various throwing knives – buy or unlock them all!
- Different types of missions – are you dare to complete all of it?

Use all your throwing skills to become a champion and hit all targets without misses! Enjoy the atmosphere of sports contest and have fun with Knife Throwing Master 3D!
